sen.j: 東亞キネマ株式會社（とうあ-、1923年 設立 - 1932年11月 買収）は、かつて存在した日本の映画会社である。
sen.e: Toa Kinema Co., Ltd. (Toa, it was established in 1923 and was purchased in November 1932) was an once-existed Japanese movie company.
Toa Kinema (Toa, established in 1923- purchased in November 1932) is a Japanese film company that once existed.
sen.cmt: 全文修正しました。
sen.e: Toa Kinema (Toa, established in 1923- purchased in November 1932) is a Japanese film company that once existed.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 兵庫県西宮市と京都府京都市に撮影所を持ち、大正末期から昭和初年にかけて、サイレント映画を製作・配給した。
sen.e: It had studios in Nishinomiya City, Hyogo Prefecture and Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, and it produced and distributed silent films during the period from the late Taisho era to the early Showa era.
It had studios in Nishinomiya City, Hyogo Prefecture and Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, and produced and distributed silent films from late Taisho to the first year of Showa periods.
sen.cmt: 後半部を全文修正しました。
sen.e: It had studios in Nishinomiya City, Hyogo Prefecture and Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, and produced and distributed silent films from late Taisho to the first year of Showa periods.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 大正バブル期に金融資本の多角経営の一事業として出発。
sen.e: It was established by a financial institution as a part of its diversified business during the era of Taisho bubble economy.
It was established by a financial institution as a part of its diversified business during the era of Taisho bubble economy.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: It was established by a financial institution as a part of its diversified business during the era of Taisho bubble economy.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 「日本映画の父」とよばれた牧野省三をはじめ、日本映画黎明期を代表する映画人を多く輩出した。
sen.e: A lot of movie people, including Shozo MAKINO who is called "father of Japanese movie", appeared from the company.
The company produced a lot of movie people who represent the earliest days of Japanese film, including Shozo MAKINO who was called the "father of Japanese film."
sen.cmt: 「日本映画黎明期を代表する」訳漏れのため全文修正して対応しました。
sen.e: The company produced a lot of movie people who represent the earliest days of Japanese film, including Shozo MAKINO who was called the "father of Japanese film."
sen.cmt: 修正なし

tit.j: 大正バブル＋関東大震災
tit.e: Taisho economic bubble and the Kanto Great Earthquake
Taisho economic bubble and the Kanto Great Earthquake
Taisho economic bubble and the Kanto Great Earthquake

sen.j: 1923年（大正12年）12月、いわゆる「大正バブル」的企業のひとつ、八千代生命が映画事業に乗り出し、兵庫県西宮市甲陽園にあった「甲陽キネマ」を買収して設立したのが、この「東亜キネマ」である。
sen.e: "Toa Kinema" was establishied in December 1923 by Yachiyo Life Insurance Company, one of so-called "Taisho bubble " companies, when it purchased "Koyo Kinema" located in Koyoen, Nishinomiya City, Hyogo Prefecture.

Toa Kinema' was established in December 1923 by Yachiyo Life Insurance Company, one of so-called 'Taisho bubble' companies, when it embarked on the movie business and purchased 'Koyo Kinema' located in Koyoen, Nishinomiya City, Hyogo Prefecture.
sen.cmt: ダブルコーテーションをシングルコーテーションに修正しました。「映画事業に乗り出し」訳漏れのため、it embarked on the movie business and を追記して対応しました。
sen.e: Toa Kinema' was established in December 1923 by Yachiyo Life Insurance Company, one of so-called 'Taisho bubble' companies, when it embarked on the movie business and purchased 'Koyo Kinema' located in Koyoen, Nishinomiya City, Hyogo Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: おりしも、同年9月1日に起きた関東大震災で首都が壊滅し、松竹や日活の在京撮影所が京都に避難・機能移転した。
sen.e: After Tokyo was devastated by the Kanto Great Earthquake occurred on September 1 of the same year, studios of Shochiku and Nikkatsu located in Tokyo were relocated to Kyoto.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: After Tokyo was devastated by the Kanto Great Earthquake occurred on September 1 of the same year, studios of Shochiku and Nikkatsu located in Tokyo were relocated to Kyoto.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: After Tokyo was devastated by the Kanto Great Earthquake occurred on September 1 of the same year, studios of Shochiku and Nikkatsu located in Tokyo were relocated to Kyoto.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 同様に、浅草公園六区の「浅草オペラ」の役者たちや国際活映大都映画巣鴨撮影所のスタッフや俳優たちが、この新撮影所になだれ込んだ。
sen.e: Similarly, players of "Asakusa Opera" located in Asakusakoen Rokku as well as players and staff of the Sugamo studio of Kokusai Katsuei Daito Eiga joined this new studio.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: Similarly, players of 'Asakusa Opera' located in Asakusakoen Rokku as well as players and staff of the Sugamo studio of Kokusai Katsuei Daito Eiga rolled in this new studio.
sen.cmt: ダブルコーテーションをシングルコーテーションに修正しました。joined を rolled in に修正しました。
sen.e: Similarly, players of 'Asakusa Opera' located in Asakusakoen Rokku as well as players and staff of the Sugamo studio of Kokusai Katsuei Daito Eiga rolled in this new studio.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 東京の高松豊次郎の主宰した小プロダクション「活動写真資料研究会」の「タカマツ・アズマプロダクション吾嬬撮影所」の所長兼監督だった山根幹人は、この設立と同時に入社し、「東亜キネマ甲陽撮影所」の監督となった。
sen.e: Mikito YAMANE, who was the head cum director of "Azuma Studio, Takamatsu Azuma Production" of "Katsudo Shashin Shiryo Kenkyukai", a small production presided by Toyojiro Takamatsu in Tokyo, joined the company when it was established and became a director of "Toa Kinema Koyo Studio".
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: Mikito YAMANE, who was the head and director of 'Azuma Studio, Takamatsu Azuma Production' of 'Katsudo Shashin Shiryo Kenkyukai,' a small production presided by Toyojiro TAKAMATSU in Tokyo, joined the company when it was established and became a director of 'Toa Kinema Koyo Studio.'
sen.cmt: 全文修正しました。
sen.e: Mikito YAMANE, who was the head and director of 'Azuma Studio, Takamatsu Azuma Production' of 'Katsudo Shashin Shiryo Kenkyukai,' a small production presided by Toyojiro TAKAMATSU in Tokyo, joined the company when it was established and became a director of 'Toa Kinema Koyo Studio.'
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: また同社で活躍した、岩岡商会を率いる撮影技師の岩岡巽が「甲陽撮影所」の所長に就任した。
sen.e: Also, Tatsumi Iwaoka, a camera operator who led Iwaoka Shokai, became the head of "Koyo Studio".
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: Also, Tatsumi IWAOKA, a camera operator who led Iwaoka Shokai, became the head of 'Koyo Studio.'
sen.cmt: Iwaoka を IWAOKA に修正しました。"Koyo Studio". を 'Koyo Studio.' に修正しました。
sen.e: Also, Tatsumi IWAOKA, a camera operator who led Iwaoka Shokai, became the head of 'Koyo Studio.'
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 設立の半年後の1924年（大正13年）6月、京都の牧野省三の「マキノ映画製作所」を吸収合併した。
sen.e: In June 1924, half a year after its establishment, the company purchased Shozo MAKINO's "Makino Eiga Seisakusho" located in Kyoto.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: In June 1924, half a year after its establishment, the company purchased Shozo MAKINO's 'Makino Film Productions' in Kyoto.
sen.cmt: "Makino Eiga Seisakusho" located を'Makino Film Productions' in に修正しました。
sen.e: In June 1924, half a year after its establishment, the company purchased Shozo MAKINO's 'Makino Film Productions' in Kyoto.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 「マキノ等持院撮影所」を「東亜キネマ等持院撮影所」と改称、牧野を甲陽・等持院の両撮影所の所長に任命した。
sen.e: "Makino Tojiin Studio" was renamed "Toa Kinema Tojiin Studio", and Makino was appointed to the head of both Koyo Studio and Tojin Studio.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: "Makino Tojiin Studio" was renamed "Toa Kinema Tojiin Studio," and Makino was appointed to the head of both Koyo Studio and Tojin Studio.
sen.cmt: Tojiin Studio", のカンマをコーテーション内に移動しました。
sen.e: "Makino Tojiin Studio" was renamed "Toa Kinema Tojiin Studio," and Makino was appointed to the head of both Koyo Studio and Tojin Studio.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 以降、両撮のデュアル・プロダクション体制で、現代劇および時代劇を量産した。
sen.e: Since then, the company produced a lot of modern films as well as historical films using these two studios.
Since then, the company produced a lot of modern films as well as historical ones under the dual-production system.
sen.cmt: using these two studios をunder the dual-production system に修正しました。
sen.e: Since then, the company has produced a lot of modern films as well as historical ones under a dual-production system in which both studios were used.
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせて修正

sen.j: 「等持院撮影所」の時代劇部の内部で東亜派と旧マキノ派が対立、1925年1月、同撮影所を「東亜マキノ等持院撮影所」と改称。
sen.e: As conflicts occurred between Toa group and former Makino group inside the historical films department of "Tojiin Studio", the studio was renamed "Toa Makino Tojiin Studio "in January 1925.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: As conflicts occurred between Toa group and former Makino group inside the historical films department of 'Tojiin Studio,' the studio was renamed "Toa Makino Tojiin Studio "in January 1925.
sen.cmt: "Tojiin Studio", を 'Tojiin Studio,' に修正しました。
sen.e: As conflicts occurred between Toa group and former Makino group inside the historical films department of 'Tojiin Studio,' the studio was renamed "Toa Makino Tojiin Studio "in January 1925.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 牧野がひきつづき所長、31歳の山根幹人を所長代理にしてリスタートするも、同年3月には失火により焼失。
sen.e: Makino remained as the head of studio while Mikito YAMANE, who was then 31 years old, was appointed to the deputy head, but the studio was burnt down by an accidental fire in March of the same year.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: Makino remained as the head of studio while Mikito YAMANE, who was then 31 years old, was appointed to the deputy head, but the studio was burnt down by an accidental fire in March of the same year.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: Makino remained as the head of studio while Mikito YAMANE, who was then 31 years old, was appointed to the deputy head, but the studio was burnt down by an accidental fire in March of the same year.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 同年6月、牧野省三は東亜キネマから独立し、「マキノ・プロダクション」を設立、「御室撮影所」を設立する。
sen.e: In June of the year, Makino became independent from Toa Kinema, established "Makino Production" and established "Omuro Studio".
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: In June of the year, Makino became independent from Toa Kinema, established 'Makino Production' and established 'Omuro Studio.'
sen.cmt: ダブルコーテーションをシングルコーテーションに修正しました。
sen.e: In June of the year, Makino became independent from Toa Kinema, established 'Makino Production' and established 'Omuro Studio.'
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 等持院撮影所の旧マキノ派は新生マキノ・プロに結集した。
sen.e: Former Makino group of Tojiin Studio also joined Makino Production.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: Former Makino group of Tojiin Studio also joined the newly established Makino Production.
sen.cmt: 「新生」訳漏れのため newly born を追記して対応しました。
sen.e: Former Makino group of Tojiin Studio also joined the newly established Makino Production.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 山根もマキノ派に合流、東京では牧野の動きに呼応して、高松豊次郎が「タカマツ・アズマプロダクション」を設立、「マキノ東京派」を構成した。
sen.e: Yamane also joined Makino group, and in Tokyo, ToyojiroTakamatsu established "Takamatsu Azuma Production" in concert with Makino's movement and it became "Makino Tokyo group".
Yamane also joined Makino group, and in Tokyo, ToyojiroTAKAMATSU established 'Takamatsu Azuma Production' in concert with Makino's movement and it became 'Makino Tokyo group.'
sen.cmt: Takamatsu を TAKAMATSU に修正しました。ダブルコーテーションをシングルコーテーションに修正しました。
sen.e: Yamane also joined Makino group, and in Tokyo, ToyojiroTAKAMATSU established 'Takamatsu Azuma Production' in concert with Makino's movement and it became 'Makino Tokyo group.'
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: マキノ派去りしのちの「等持院撮影所」は「東亜キネマ京都撮影所」と改称、所長には同社の親会社・八千代生命の宣伝部長である小笹正人が就任した。
sen.e: After Makino left, "Tojiin Studio" was renamed "Toa Kinema Kyoto Studio" and Masato Ozasa, the manager of advertisement department of parent company Yachiyo Insurance, became the head of studio.
After Makino left, 'Tojiin Studio' was renamed "Toa Kinema Kyoto Studio" and Masato OZASA, the manager of advertisement department of parent company Yachiyo Insurance, became the head of studio.
sen.cmt: ダブルコーテーションをシングルコーテーションに修正しました。Ozasa を OZASA に修正しました。
sen.e: After Makino left, 'Tojiin Studio' was renamed "Toa Kinema Kyoto Studio" and Masato OZASA, the manager of advertisement department of parent company Yachiyo Insurance, became the head of studio.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: マキノ派分離の2年後の1927年（昭和2年）、東亜キネマは「甲陽撮影所」を閉鎖、等持院の「東亜キネマ京都撮影所」に製作事業の拠点を一元化した。
sen.e: In 1927, two years after Makino group left the company, Toa Kinema closed "Koyo Studio" and concentrated its film production business at "Toa Kinema Kyoto Studio".
In 1927, two years after Makino group left the company, Toa Kinema closed 'Koyo Studio' and concentrated its film production business at 'Toa Kinema Kyoto Studio.'
sen.cmt: ダブルコーテーションをシングルコーテーションに修正しました。
sen.e: In 1927, two years after Makino group left the company, Toa Kinema closed 'Koyo Studio' and concentrated its film production business at 'Toa Kinema Kyoto Studio.'
sen.cmt: 修正なし

tit.j: バブル崩壊と阪急資本
tit.e: Bust of bubble economy and Hankyu capital
Bust of bubble economy and Hankyu capital
Bust of bubble economy and Hankyu capital

sen.j: 1929年（昭和4年）3月、小笹が同社を退社、出版事業等にも手を出して没落した親会社・八千代生命が映画製作事業から撤退する。
sen.e: In march 1929, Ozasa resigned from the company and parent company Yachiyo Insurance withdrew from film production business because it failed in publishing business and went to ruin.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: In march 1929, Ozasa resigned from the company and parent company Yachiyo Insurance withdrew from film production business because it failed in publishing business and went to ruin.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: In march 1929, Ozasa resigned from the company and parent company Yachiyo Insurance withdrew from film production business because it failed in publishing business and went to ruin.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: その後、牧野の長女の夫・高村正次が京都撮影所長に就任し、事業の立て直しを図った。
sen.e: Thereafter, Masatsugu TAKAMURA, the husband of Makino's oldest daughter, became the head of Kyoto Studio and started to revive the business.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: Thereafter, Masatsugu TAKAMURA, the husband of Makino's oldest daughter, became the head of Kyoto Studio and started to revive the business.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: Thereafter, Masatsugu TAKAMURA, the husband of Makino's oldest daughter, became the head of Kyoto Studio and started to revive the business.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 1930年（昭和5年）に阪急電鉄の小林一三が設立した「宝塚映画」に働きかけ、資金面での提携を図った。
sen.e: In 1930, the company entered into a capital alliance with "Takarazuka Eiga" which was established by Ichizo KOBAYASHI of Hankyu Railway.
In 1930, the company entered into a capital alliance with 'Takarazuka Eiga' which was established by Ichizo KOBAYASHI of Hankyu Railway.
sen.cmt: ダブルコーテーションをシングルコーテーションに修正しました。
sen.e: In 1930, the company entered into a capital alliance with 'Takarazuka Eiga' which was established by Ichizo KOBAYASHI of Hankyu Railway.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 1931年（昭和6年）9月、同社の製作代行をする会社として「東活映画社」が設立される。
sen.e: In September 1931, "Tokatsu Eigasha" was established as a company which was supposed to produce films on the company's behalf.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: In September 1931, 'Tokatsu Eigasha' was established as a company which was supposed to produce films on the company's behalf.
sen.cmt: ダブルコーテーションをシングルコーテーションに修正しました。
sen.e: In September 1931, 'Tokatsu Eigasha' was established as a company which was supposed to produce films on the company's behalf.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 高村は退陣、安倍辰五郎が「東活映画等持院撮影所」の所長に就任した。
sen.e: Takamura resigned as the head of studio and Tatsugoro ABE became the head of "Tokatsu Eiga Tojiin Studio".
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: Takamura resigned as the head of studio and Tatsugoro ABE became the head of 'Tokatsu Eiga Tojiin Studio.'
sen.cmt: ダブルコーテーションをシングルコーテーションに修正しました。
sen.e: Takamura resigned as the head of studio and Tatsugoro ABE became the head of 'Tokatsu Eiga Tojiin Studio.'
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 高村は小説家・映画プロデューサーの直木三十五の協力を得て「大衆文芸映画社」、「正映マキノ」を設立してゆく。
sen.e: Takamura established "Taishu Bungei Eigasha" and "Shoei Makino" with the help of Sanjugo NAOKI, a novelist cum film producer.
Takamura established 'Taishu Bungei Eigasha' and 'Shoei Makino' with the help of Sanjugo NAOKI, a novelist and film producer.
sen.cmt: ダブルコーテーションをシングルコーテーションに修正しました。cum を and に修正しました。
sen.e: Takamura established 'Taishu Bungei Eigasha' and 'Shoei Makino' with the help of Sanjugo NAOKI, a novelist and film producer.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 翌1932年（昭和7年）10月、わずか1年で東活映画社が解散し、東亜キネマは製作事業をついに断念、「等持院撮影所」を閉鎖する。
sen.e: In October 1932, Tokatsu Eigasha was dissolved only one year after its establishment, and Toa Kinema finally gave up to continue film production business and closed "Tojiin Studio".
In October 1932, Tokatsu Eigasha was dissolved only one year after its establishment, and Toa Kinema finally gave up to continue film production business and closed 'Tojiin Studio.'
sen.cmt: ダブルコーテーションをシングルコーテーションに修正しました。
sen.e: In October 1932, Tokatsu Eigasha was dissolved only one year after its establishment, and Toa Kinema finally gave up to continue film production business and closed 'Tojiin Studio.'
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 同年11月、「正映マキノ」の高村が再度登場し東亜キネマを買収、「御室撮影所」に宝塚キネマを設立する。
sen.e: In November of the year, Takamura of "Shoei Makino" again purchased Toa Kinema and established Takarazuka Kinema at "Omuro Studio".
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: In November of the year, Takamura of 'Shoei Makino' again purchased Toa Kinema and established Takarazuka Kinema at 'Omuro Studio.'
sen.cmt: ダブルコーテーションをシングルコーテーションに修正しました。
sen.e: In November of the year, Takamura of 'Shoei Makino' again purchased Toa Kinema and established Takarazuka Kinema at 'Omuro Studio.'
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: こうして、東亜キネマはその9年間の歴史に幕を閉じた。
sen.e: Thus, Toa Kinema ended its nine-year history.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: Thus, Toa Kinema ended its nine-year history.
sen.cmt: OK
sen.e: Thus, Toa Kinema ended its nine-year history.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 「等持院撮影所」は競売に付され、翌1933年（昭和8年）5月には住宅地となった。
sen.e: "Tojiin Studio" was sold at auction and the site became a residential district in May 1933.
Tojiin Studio' was sold at auction and the site became a residential district in May 1933.
sen.cmt: ダブルコーテーションをシングルコーテーションに修正しました。
sen.e: Tojiin Studio' was sold at auction and the site became a residential district in May 1933.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
